text: Hagi anama huteno'a Manase'a Jerusalemi kumamofona zage hanati kaziga, Gihoni agupoma me'nea kaziga have keginamofona amefi'a, mago zaza have kegina huno nozame kuma kafane nehazare uhanatiteno, Oferie nehaza agonarega ana kegina huno mareri'ne. Hagi sondia vahete kva vahetmina tusinasi vihuma me'nea rankumatmima Juda mopafima me'nea rankumatmimpi zamantetere hu'ne.
